flow.title: Get your home insurance quote
flow.bodyHtml: We’ll ask about your property, occupancy, cover, and claims history.

display.title: Home insurance quote
display.subtitle: Buildings and/or contents
display.bodyHtml: Answer a few questions about your home and the people who live there. You can review details before you continue.

display.title: Quick tip
display.bodyHtml: Having your construction details and rough values (rebuild/contents) will help.

questions.title: What would you like to insure?
questions.help: Buildings covers the structure. Contents covers your belongings.

questions.title: When would you like cover to start?
questions.help: Start date must be within 60 days.

display.title: About you
display.bodyHtml: You’ll be the policyholder responsible for payments and managing the policy.

questions.title: Preferred telephone number
questions.help: We may contact you about your quote or policy.

flow.title: Your address
flow.bodyHtml: Tell us where the property is located.

display.title: Address details
display.bodyHtml: We use your address to confirm risk details and any address history requirements.

questions.title: How long have you lived at this address?
Have you lived at any previous addresses in the last 3 years?
questions.help: If yes, you can add previous addresses.

flow.title: Your home
flow.bodyHtml: Tell us about the property you want to insure.

display.title: Property details
display.bodyHtml: Tell us about the property construction and occupancy.

questions.title: What type of property is it?
If it’s a flat/maisonette, which floor is it on?
Is the property of standard construction?
questions.help: Standard is usually brick/stone walls with tile/slate roof.

questions.title: Longest period the property is left unoccupied

display.title: Cover options
display.bodyHtml: Choose sums insured, excess and optional cover.

questions.title: Buildings sum insured (rebuild cost)
questions.help: The rebuild cost is different to the market value.

questions.title: Would you like to add accidental damage cover?
questions.help: Accidental damage covers sudden and unexpected damage (subject to policy terms).

flow.title: Claims
flow.bodyHtml: Tell us about any claims in the last 5 years.

display.title: Claims history
display.bodyHtml: Please include all claims and incidents. Not disclosing claims can affect cover or a claim.

questions.title: Have you had any home insurance claims in the last 5 years?
questions.help: Include buildings or contents claims, even if no payment was made.

display.title: Declarations
display.bodyHtml: Please confirm before viewing your quote.

questions.title: I confirm I have read and understood the privacy notice.
I confirm the information I’ve given is true to the best of my knowledge.

display.title: Your preferences
display.bodyHtml: You can change your marketing preferences at any time.

questions.title: Would you like to receive marketing from us?

display.title: Check your details
display.subtitle: Home insurance
display.bodyHtml: Review your answers before viewing your quote.

display.title: Key details
display.bodyHtml: This page is a playback of what you’ve entered. If something looks wrong, go back and change it.

display.title: Your cover
display.bodyHtml:
Cover: (selected)
Start date: (selected)
Excess: (selected)

display.title: Next step
display.bodyHtml: When you continue, we’ll generate your quote based on the details provided.

flow.title: Your quote
flow.bodyHtml: Here’s your quote based on the details entered.

display.title: Your quote
display.subtitle: Home insurance
display.bodyHtml: This is an example quote display. In a live integration, pricing would come from your rating engine.

questions.title: How would you like to pay?
questions.help: Monthly payments are typically an instalment plan and may include interest.

display.title: Annual payment
display.bodyHtml: Pay the full premium upfront.

display.title: Monthly payments
display.bodyHtml: Example instalments shown for illustration only. Interest may apply depending on the provider.

display.title: What’s included
display.bodyHtml:
Cover: (selected)
Key assumptions: (selected)

display.title: Important
display.bodyHtml: This quote assumes the information provided is accurate. You can amend answers before you buy.

display.title: Next steps
display.bodyHtml: Continue to choose payment details and complete purchase.

flow.title: Payment
flow.bodyHtml: Choose how you’d like to pay and enter payment details.

display.title: Payment for your Home insurance
display.subtitle: Choose a payment option
display.bodyHtml: Enter your payment details to proceed. In production, integrate a secure payment provider.

display.title: Payment options
display.bodyHtml:
Annual: pay in full now.
Monthly: pay by instalments (usually Direct Debit).

questions.title: Payment method
questions.help: Monthly instalments are usually collected by Direct Debit.

display.title: Important
display.bodyHtml: Payment fields here are for demonstration only.

display.title: Final checks
display.bodyHtml: Before completing payment, ensure your details are correct.

questions.title: How would you like to receive your documents?
I confirm I am authorised to make this payment and the details provided are correct.
